lines.text: Well, Mr. Delany, been playing policemen, I hear.
Yeah, what have you been playing, Scrabble?

[opens the door of the darkroom]
Hello, hello! What's going on here, I wouldn't be surprised...
You are hereby summoned to the royal execution chamber, pdq.
Oooh, Old Waffle-Face is really mad at you, Delaney. I wouldn't like to be in your shoes, I really wouldn't.
Look, do me a favour. Why don't you run upstairs - see how far you can lean out of the window, huh?
